name: It's Corn! (grid96)
description:
Defend your field from birds trying to steal all the precious corn you cultivated!

Can you beat my personal best of 1250$?

PREAMBLE - After many years of illness, I was finally able to participate in Ludum Dare again. I still don’t have any diagnosis for the pain in my hands, but over the past year I was able to slowly adjust my workspace, to take back the freedom of coding that I had lost. I created this entire game without using my hands even once, even this text. All was done using eye tracking, voice commands and a list of other partially self-made tools.

Engine: Unity

IDE: IntelliJ Rider

Graphics: Photoshop

Music: BeepBox

Original “It’s Corn” song by The Gregory Brothers.

“Alagard” font by Hewett Tsoi.
